forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Areas of patchy fog early. A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Areas of patchy fog early. A mix of clouds and sun during the morning will give way to cloudy skies this afternoon. High 53F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy after midnight. Low near 5C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies this evening will become partly cloudy after midnight. Low 41F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 12C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 54F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.
